scripts.info: IMPORTANT NOTE: Please make sure to replace any harcoded values like region, AWS account ID, etc.
scripts.network:deploy: cdk deploy --app "./mvnw -e -q compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=dev.stratospheric.cdk.NetworkApp" -c environmentName=default -c region=us-west-1 -c accountId=234440145524 --require-approval never
scripts.network:destroy: cdk destroy --app "./mvnw -e -q compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=dev.stratospheric.cdk.NetworkApp" -c environmentName=default -c region=us-west-1 -c accountId=234440145524 --force --require-approval never
scripts.repository:deploy: cdk deploy --app "./mvnw -e -q compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=dev.stratospheric.cdk.DockerRepositoryApp" -c region=us-west-1 -c accountId=234440145524 -c applicationName=aws-test --require-approval never
scripts.repository:destroy: cdk destroy --app "./mvnw -e -q compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=dev.stratospheric.cdk.DockerRepositoryApp" -c region=us-west-1 -c accountId=234440145524 -c applicationName=aws-test --force --require-approval never
scripts.service:deploy: cdk deploy --app "./mvnw -e -q compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=dev.stratospheric.cdk.ServiceApp" -c springProfile=aws -c dockerImageUrl=234440145524.dkr.ecr.us-west-1.amazonaws.com/aws-test:latest -c environmentName=default -c region=us-west-1 -c accountId=234440145524 -c applicationName=aws-default --require-approval never
scripts.service:destroy: cdk destroy --app "./mvnw -e -q compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=dev.stratospheric.cdk.ServiceApp" -c springProfile=aws -c dockerImageUrl=234440145524.dkr.ecr.us-west-1.amazonaws.com/aws-test:latest -c environmentName=default -c region=us-west-1 -c accountId=234440145524 -c applicationName=aws-default --force --require-approval never
scripts.deployment-sequencer:deploy: cdk deploy "*" --app "./mvnw -e -q compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=dev.stratospheric.cdk.DeploymentSequencerApp" -c accountId=234440145524 -c applicationName=aws-test -c region=us-west-1 --require-approval never
scripts.deployment-sequencer:destroy: cdk destroy "*" --app "./mvnw -e -q compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=dev.stratospheric.cdk.DeploymentSequencerApp" -c accountId=234440145524 -c applicationName=aws-test -c region=us-west-1 --require-approval never
